creator: AppiVa Software Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
ezTask.io is a smart sales CRM platform available in native mobile app and web app. It is a CRM system to bundle up your whole business in one, accessible place. It thoroughly automates your most time-consuming sales processes, helps expand the client network, and optimize your business all-around with these readily available automation opportunities that may be priceless for you in the long run. Its smart calls and emails integration and geo-fencing will help sales and field force in automatically entering data – increasing productivity by as much as 40%.
Why ezTask.io?
Customisation - Most CRM are designed around Enterprise
Ease of use - Sales and marketing team don’t want to enter data
Affordability - SME cannot afford Complex CRM solutions – too pricey
Automation - Transition from Traditional Practices. Entering and managing data in excel sheets is time consuming and error prone
SME needs a platform to have end to end functionalities - Cannot afford multiple applications for their operations.

Some of its high level features are:
Cloud-based sales automation, available anywhere, any device, Web & Mobile Apps
Designed for SME, Cost-effective
Dedicated Dashboard with real time performance reports to improve your sales numbers
Relevant, ready-made data to analyze business trends and take decisions.
Multiple roles - Permission based role to help you in efficient role based business process
On demand call recording and audio analysis - to help on customer interaction.
Seamless Cashflow and Invoice Management process.
Business process automation with multi-team strategy improves business efficiency by smoothening inter-departmental coordination.
Document management allows you anytime, anywhere access to all your uploaded documents - with permission
GPS based attendance management system helps to accurately measure time spent and improve efficiency.
Reports and Dashboards help you to analyze market trends, review business performance, identify and eliminate bottlenecks for pro-active decision making.
Personalized AI engine to manage SMS and mails, so important communications are not missed - Next Release
Helps in generating quality leads through it’s AI Chat Bot Framework (eZilly) - Next Release

Its smart calls and emails integration and geo-fencing will help sales and field force in automatically entering data – increasing productivity by as much as 40%.
Why ezTask.io?
Customisation - Most CRM are designed around Enterprise
Ease of use - Sales and marketing team don’t want to enter data
Affordability - SME cannot afford Complex CRM solutions – too pricey
Automation - Transition from Traditional Practices. Entering and managing data in excel sheets is time consuming and error prone
SME needs a platform to have end to end functionalities - Cannot afford multiple applications for their operations.

Some of its high level features are:
Cloud-based sales automation, available anywhere, any device, Web & Mobile Apps
Designed for SME, Cost-effective
Dedicated Dashboard with real time performance reports to improve your sales numbers
Relevant, ready-made data to analyze business trends and take decisions.
Multiple roles - Permission based role to help you in efficient role based business process
On demand call recording and audio analysis - to help on customer interaction.
Seamless Cashflow and Invoice Management process.
Business process automation with multi-team strategy improves business efficiency by smoothening inter-departmental coordination.
Document management allows you anytime, anywhere access to all your uploaded documents - with permission
GPS based attendance management system helps to accurately measure time spent and improve efficiency.
Reports and Dashboards help you to analyze market trends, review business performance, identify and eliminate bottlenecks for pro-active decision making.
Personalized AI engine to manage SMS and mails, so important communications are not missed - Next Release
Helps in generating quality leads through it’s AI Chat Bot Framework (eZilly) - Next Release
